intro: This is the first non-beta release of the add-on.
notes: Browser generator can be stopped mid-batch
Compatibile with Handy Answer Key Shortcuts add-on
Long phrase support for Google Translate
Fixes for some SAPI 5 TTS engines
Support for delaying playback of audio
Strip some special strings and symbols from input
Improved messaging for Google Translate HTTP 503 errors
synopsis: Users will want to update for access to automatic updates.
